attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The very people who created our economic demise have no mercy in repossessing houses. This must stop immediately. The people of this country should not be made homeless because of greedy & irresponsible bankers, and other lending institutions. I don't believe that this issue has received enough attention at all. Probably on behalf of many thousands I implore you Mr Brown to take some serious action now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
